Prohibition is available for private bookings, corporate events, rehearsal dinners and weddings. In addition to our main dining room which seats 70 guests, and over 120 standing, we also offer two distinctive and beautiful climate controlled outdoor patio and indoor patio areas that can seat up to 150 guests. Whether your event requires a tailor made menu or a custom crafted cocktail, our team is happy to work with you in creating your next memorable event.

547 King St, Charleston, SC 29403

843-459-7214

info@prohibitioncharleston.com

BUSINESS HOURS

Mon - wed 4pm - Closethurs - Sunday 11am - close‚ÄçHappy Hour Monday-Thursday 4pm-6pm (bar only)
SEO by Rank The Coast

[Page Title: Prohibition Charleston - Best Cocktail Bar in Charleston, SC]

Sippin' santa takes over prohibition
From November 27th through New Year‚Äôs Eve, Prohibition will be transformed into Sippin‚Äô Santa ‚Äî our annual Tiki-themed Christmas pop-up bar. During this time, the restaurant will be fully decked out in over-the-top tropical holiday d√©cor, complete with twinkling lights, themed glassware, and a lively, festive atmosphere throughout the space. We will be taking some very limited reservations. Walk-ins are encouraged.

Ring in 2026 at Sippin' Santa for a night of festive drinks and good vibes.Come join us at for a night of festive fun and celebration as we ring in the new year in style! Conveniently located on upper King Street at Prohibition, Sippin' Santa has three bars with a large outdoor heated patio that is the perfect setting to enjoy New Years Eve with your closest friends.
Welcome to New Year's Eve at Sippin' Santa!‚Äç Prohibition presents: Sippin' Santa

bottle service available now

Prohibition Charleston is excited to announce its new bottle service, elevating our nightlife experience to new heights. Patrons can now indulge in a curated selection of ¬†Champagnes & Premium Spirits (with complimentary mixers). This exclusive service ensures guests enjoy personalized attention and a touch of luxury, perfect for celebrations or a refined night out.Whether you‚Äôre toasting a special occasion or simply enjoying a night on the town, Prohibition Charleston‚Äôs bottle service promises an unforgettable experience.

about prohibition

PROHIBITION BAR & RESTAURANT

A nod to the classic 1920‚Äôs speakeasy, Prohibition feels like you‚Äôre stepping back in time with its vintage-inspired decor. Our cocktails and cuisine, however, are anything but old-fashioned. Begin with an inventive cocktail crafted by Beverage Director Jim McCourt, who constantly dreams up balanced and thought-provoking libations. In the kitchen our acclaimed chef Greg Garrison puts a sophisticated and modern spin on Southern classics.

BEST OF CHARLESTON 2020

Thank you to everyone who showed us love by nominating Prohibition under ‚ÄúBest Downtown Bar‚Äù & ‚ÄúBest Cocktails‚Äù for Charleston City Paper ‚ÄúBest of Charleston 2020‚Äù!

PRIVATE EVENT SPACE

Make your next event a memorable one at Prohibition Charleston. With 3 distinct areas available to book and a capacity to host up to 150 people, Prohibition offers an unique setting for your next Birthday Party, Anniversary Party, Rehearsal Dinner, Wedding Reception, Corporate event, Team Banquet, and more!

book your event

Prohibition is available for private bookings, corporate events, rehearsal dinners and weddings. In addition to our main dining room which seats 70 guests, and over 120 standing, we also offer two distinctive and beautiful climate controlled outdoor patio and indoor patio areas that can seat up to 150 guests. Whether your event requires a tailor made menu or a custom crafted cocktail, our team is happy to work with you in creating your next memorable event.

547 King St, Charleston, SC 29403

843-459-7214
